data.description:
These Zombie Donuts aren’t for eating.

Doesn’t matter if you’re Old-fashioned or a fresh Donut-hole, Zombie Donuts 2 is non-stop fun for everyone. This arcade shooter is sure to satisfy your sweet-tooth! 

Scared? Don’t be so mallow-dramatic! Equipped with your marshmallow blaster, protect yourself from the endless servings of Zombie Donuts! Show off your skill by hitting bonus candy and landing trickshots. Discover unexpected treats for sweet bonuses.

Be careful -- the longer you survive, the faster they spawn!

Feeling hungry?

changelog.change_log:
- Ready for the sweet embrace of an endless zombie hoard?  We've got you covered in frosting..until the undead break through new sugary defenses.  How long will you last?
- Still looking for that easy win?  Play perfect rounds, collecting candy goodness to max your personal best at every level.
- The candy apocalypse can be enjoyed on the couch or standing your ground in 180 and 360 modes.
- The marshmallow gun has been super charged, and every 10 levels, your score for zombie hits get a bonus multiplier.
- New game stats have been added, so you can track and share your mad skills in more detail.
